summary: This document contains an email exchange between Amanda Kirby and Lesley Groff regarding scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein. The correspondence indicates a change in Epstein's availability, moving a proposed meeting from October 8 to October 10, 2013.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas and is involved in scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is communicating with Amanda Kirby about the scheduling of a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual with whom Amanda Kirby and Lesley Groff are trying to schedule a meeting.

events.title: Proposed Meeting with Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A meeting was proposed for October 8, 2013, but was later rescheduled to October 10, 2013.
